code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import QuoteForm from"../components/quote";import backendURL from"../components/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OneServicePage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[service,setService]=useState(null);const[showQuoteForm,setShowQuoteForm]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const fetchService=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendURL,"/api/services/").concat(id));setService(response.data);};fetchService();},[id]);if(!service)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"one-service-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowQuoteForm(!showQuoteForm),className:"quote-btn",children:"Get a Quote"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"service-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:service.image,alt:service.name})})]}),showQuoteForm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"quote-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuoteForm,{})})]});};export default OneServicePage;
